name: The Backrooms: You've been here before
name_original: The Backrooms: You've been here before
description:
The Backrooms: You've been here before - is a game about backrooms, made by indie developer Development Forever.

You find yourself in Backrooms and it's up to you to find out where you are and what this place is.

Endless corridors, liminal spaces and minimal plot about complete loneliness are waiting for you.

But... who knows what lies ahead?

System requirements(for now):

Minimum:

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Processor: dual core 64 bit

Memory: 1GB RAM

Graphics: 1GB VRAM

DirectX: 11

Storage: 1GB

Recommended:

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Processor: quad core 64 bit

Memory: 2GB RAM

Graphics: 2GB VRAM

DirectX: 11

Storage: 1GB

If you find bugs contact us

email: devforever.software@gmail.com
